reviews.review: Very good game and it shows with how long its lasted
A bread and butter FPS game built around necessary game sense and good aim. If you take the time to learn how to play, it can extremely addicting. You might even experience an adrenaline rush.
J'aime gagné 15-2 pour me faire remonté 15-15 grâce à un spin bot!

Güven faktörü denen saçma şeyle uğraşıyorum. Bu oyunu 2017 yılında para vererek satın aldım. Hiç bir zaman açıp da üçüncü parti bir yazılım kullanmadım. Ama saçma bir şekilde güven faktörü yetersiz geliyor, takımıma veya rakibime sürekli hile geliyor. Sanırım bu oyunun da miladı doldu. Üzdün VALVE...
es muy buen juego no es perfecto pero lo recomiendo. por que es un muy buen juego.

Je désinstalle ce jeu. j'y joue depuis 2014. Et maintenant que le jeu est gratuit, il est remplis de smurf et de cheat en tout genre et de troll. la communauté ses complètement perdu et ne parlons même plus du système de grade qui est plus que punitif. On perd plus facilement notre niveau que l'on gagne ( plus d'une dizaine de game nécessaire pour augmenter et encore si on augmente ). Le système anti-cheat pas du tout actif enfin bref. Je le déconseille fortement depuis qu'il est gratuit.
Most useless time i've wasted. If you respect yourself, if you have personal life, please, don't play it.
wery fun this i have only played for 1 hour and i really like it this is my second account thats why i only have 1 hour
um  classico que unca morrerá, mesmo a valve tentando muito kkkkk
game fucking sucks my friends always carry me pls make negative recoil (Btw I like fortnite!)

Addicting as hell. Even I got a job and a lot of money for some games I wanted to play when I was broke, I still play this game. WTF is it going on with my life?

Review #2: This game is getting harder to run on older systems like my previous laptop. Go for 8GBs of RAM in Dual-Channel and an SSD for optimal experience. Otherwise, it's a nightmare to load the game if you want to go for a match in a seconds.
Fun with friends but is very difficult
Noob game you cant even lean to the side or blow walls or ads or rappel walls or check cameras.
Umfangreiche Spielmodi, kein Pay-2-Win-Titel und vor allem einen heiden Spaß xD.
Velice dobrá hra. Vždycky mi zlepší den pár 12 letých ruských dětí, které mi řeknou, že měli pohlavní styk s mojí mámou. :)
smurf ve hile gibi bilimum orospu çocukları dolu oyunda satın almayın valo girin en azından beleş
лучшая игра, все деньги смыл туда ахаха
i like to do pew pew in this game
zajebista gierka za duzo ruskich i cheaterów
Oyun güzel ama çok hile var ve normal oyuncuları bile hile sanıp banlıyabiliyorlar
Sick of getting banned for getting forced disconnected and not being able to reconnect. Have a solid ethernet connection with over 300MBS so no "wut about internetz" fuck valve and fuck this game.
i like the game but i dont like the hackers ....
Aşırı iyi olduğunu söylemem gerek yok oynayınca keyfini anlayacaksınız.
Отличная игра, а также насос сосущий деньги. Гейб, давай цены пониже...
you have to be able to enjoy a bare bones well made shooter. once you can get passed the lack of content its truly a very enjoyable game.
Det er et mega fedt spil :D
